member.name: T:DBA.SqlDbAccess
member.summary: SQL SERVER数据库操作类
member.remarks: dim strSQL = "UPDATE [TABLENAME] SET [COLNAME]=@VALUE WHERE ID=@ID" dim params(1) = new SqlParameter() params(0) = SqlParameter("@VALUE",sqldbtype.varchar,10) params(1) = sqlparameter("@id",sqldbtype.int) params(0).value = "234" parmas(1).value = 123 try if sqldbaccess.ExecNoQuery(commandtype.text,strsql,params) != 0 then 'TODO: something end if catch ex as Exception end try
